item.title: The Tariff Power Properly Belongs with Congress
item.description: A court decision strikes a blow for the power of the legislature over taxation.

item.title: Thank Goodness for Libertarian Law Firms
item.description: They’re doing a job that others aren’t doing: standing up to executive overreach and winning.

item.title: America’s Arsenal of Democracy Needs a Reboot
item.description: The only way the United States can build materiel at scale is to harness the power of our commercial manufacturing industry.

item.title: The Addled Activist Mind
item.description: Argumentum ad Hitlerum is only one of the logical fallacies extremists use to justify nonsense.

item.title: Hidden Monsters
item.description: Surgeon Joël Le Scouarnec assaulted hundreds of patients. Why didn’t anyone stop him sooner?
